# `ListPickerSection` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| items | [`ListPickerItem[]`](listpickeritem-definition.md) | Yes | List of items to choose from in the section |
| multipleSelection | `boolean` | Yes | Whether multiple items can be selected in this section. |
| title | `string` | Yes | Required title for the section. |
